00023 #include "serverthread.h"
00024 
00025 #include <logger.h>
00026 
00030 RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread::ServerThread(){
00031   server=new EnetServer();
00032 
00033   // Simply redirect signals
00034   connect(server, SIGNAL(clientConnected(const ENetAddress &)),
00035           this  , SIGNAL(clientConnected(const ENetAddress &)));
00036 
00037   connect(server, SIGNAL(packetReceived(const tReceivedPacket&)),
00038           this  , SIGNAL(packetReceived(const tReceivedPacket&)));
00039 
00040 }
00041 
00045 RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread::~ServerThread(){
00046   delete server;
00047   server=NULL;
00048 }
00049 
00055 void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread::setPort(int i){
00056   server->setPort(i);
00057 }
00058 
00064 void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread::setMaxClient(int i){
00065   server->setMaxClient(i);
00066 
00067 }
00068 
00072 void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread::createServer(){
00073   server->createServer();
00074 
00075 }
00076 
00080 void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread::run(){
00081   while(true){
00082    server->eventLoop();
00083   }
00084 }
00085 
00089 void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread::cleanupServer(){
00090   server->cleanupServer();
00091 }
00092 
00098 EnetServer* RainbruRPG::Server::ServerThread::getServer(){
00099   return server;
00100 }
